Jumble

Class Dictionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jumble.Dictionary

  • public class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object
    File Name: Dictionary.java Description: This class will read the dictionary file and put it into an ArrayList which will be inputted into an array there will be a swap and scramble method which will swap/scramble the jumbled word.

    • Field Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dictionary() 
      Dictionary(java.io.File file)
      Description: Default Constructor - assigns variable file to the dictionary file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String createJumble()
      Description: This method will create the original word that will be swapped and scrambled.
      java.lang.String doScramble(java.lang.String word, int amount)
      Description: This method scrambles the word by swapping the letters recursively x amounts where x is a random number between 5 - 15 times.
      java.lang.String doSwap(java.lang.String word, int low, int high)
      Description: This method will swap the specific letters from the word.
      int getAmountOfAnswers()
      Description: This method returns an integer with the amount of answers of the scrambled word.
      java.lang.String[] getArrayOfWords()
      Description: This will return the arrayOfWords array
      void getFile(java.io.File file)
      Description: this methods assigns the file variable to file.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> jumbleAnswer()
      Description: This method uses a String array list to add in the permutations of a scrambled word and by using a binary search it searches through the dictionary file to match the permutations with the dictionary word and returns the words from the file.
      void readFile()
      Description: This method readFile will read all the words from the file and assign it to an array.

        public void readFile()

      • createJumble

        public java.lang.String createJumble()
        Description: This method will create the original word that will be swapped and scrambled.
        Returns:
        word that will be scrambled

      • doScramble

        public java.lang.String doScramble(java.lang.String word,
                                   int amount)
        Description: This method scrambles the word by swapping the letters recursively x amounts where x is a random number between 5 - 15 times.
        Parameters:
        word - - String of the original word
        amount - - amount of times to swap/scramble.
        Returns:
        doScramble - calls itself to scramble until amount is less than 1

      • doSwap

        public java.lang.String doSwap(java.lang.String word,
                               int low,
                               int high)
        Description: This method will swap the specific letters from the word.
        Parameters:
        word - - String of the original word
        low - - low value index of the array
        high - - high value index of the array
        Returns:
        word - which is the swapped word

      • jumbleAnswer

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> jumbleAnswer()
        Description: This method uses a String array list to add in the permutations of a scrambled word and by using a binary search it searches through the dictionary file to match the permutations with the dictionary word and returns the words from the file.
        Returns:
        scrambledWordAnswer - an array list with the solutions of the jumbled word.

      • getAmountOfAnswers

        public int getAmountOfAnswers()
        Description: This method returns an integer with the amount of answers of the scrambled word.
        Returns:
        scrambledWordAnswer - total amount of solutions to the word

      • getArrayOfWords

        public java.lang.String[] getArrayOfWords()
        Description: This will return the arrayOfWords array
        Returns:
        array - with the scrambled word
